titleInfo.title: ENERGY AND WATER DEVELOPMENT AND RELATED AGENCIES APPROPRIATIONS ACT, 2016

extension.searchTitle: ENERGY AND WATER DEVELOPMENT AND RELATED AGENCIES APPROPRIATIONS ACT, 2016; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 178

congVote.result: Three-fifths of the Senators duly chosen and sworn having voted in the affirmative, the motion is agreed to.

congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: <P/>By 63 yeas to 36 nays (Vote No. 161), Senate concurred in the amendment of the House to the amendment of the Senate to H.R. 2028, making appropriations for energy and water development and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2016, after taking action on the following amendments and motions proposed thereto:

congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Water Infrastructure Improvements for the Nation Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: <P/>By 78 yeas to 21 nays (Vote No. 163), Senate concurred in the amendment of the House to S. 612, to designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 1300 Victoria Street in Laredo, Texas, as the ``George P. Kazen Federal Building and United States Courthouse'', after taking action on the following amendments and motions proposed thereto:
